    httpRequest.open('GET', `/read/Content/${cid}.js?token=${token}&t=${new Date().valueOf()}`, true);

            var result = this.responseText;
            var url = "https://txt.yqkfqrc.com";
            url += CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(result, CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(token.substr(0, 16)), { iv: CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(token.substr(16)), mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8);
            url += "&t=" + new Date().valueOf();
            var httpRequest2 = new XMLHttpRequest();
            httpRequest2.open('GET', url, true);

var bookList = [];
var nameCount = {};

if (data.c === "200" && data.m === "æˆåŠŸå“åº”" && data.data) {
    if (Array.isArray(data.data) && data.data.length > 0) {
        // éå†data.dataæ•°ç»„ï¼Œæ„å»ºä¹¦ç±åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆå¤„ç†å¤šä¸ªä¹¦ç±æƒ…å†µï¼‰
        data.data.forEach(function (item) {
            var name = item.book_name || "";
            // å¤„ç†åŒåä¹¦ç±
            if (nameCount[name]!== undefined) {
                nameCount[name]++;
                name += " (" + nameCount[name] + ")";
            } else {
                nameCount[name] = 0;
            }
            // æ„å»ºä¹¦ç±ä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è±¡
            bookList.push({
                "name": name,
                "kind": item.itag || "",
                "intr": item.text || "",
                "cover": item.img || "",
                "bookid": item.id.book_id || "",
                "url": item.url || ""
            });
        });
    } else {
        // å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªä¹¦ç±ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå°†å…¶æ”¾å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸­
        var singleBook = {
            "name": data.data.bookname || "",
            "author": data.data.author || "",
            "kind": data.data.itag || "",
            "intr": data.data.description || "",
            "lastest_chapter_name": data.data.lastest_chapter_name || "",
            "cover": data.data.img || "",
            "bookid": data.data.id.book_id || ""
        
        };
        bookList.push(singleBook);
    }
}

result = bookList;

searchUrl:
<js>
(function() {
	
    var url="https://api.ttxz.eu.org"
    var key = java.key; 
    var pattern = /bqxs520\.com\/book\/(.*)\.shtml/; 
    var match = key.match(pattern); 
    var finalUrl;

    if (match && match.length > 1) {
       
        finalUrl = url+"/bqxs520/detail?book_id=" + match[1];
    } else {
       
        finalUrl = url+"/bqxs520/search?query=" + key;
    }

    // è¿”å›æœ€ç»ˆçš„URL
    return finalUrl;
})()
</js>

		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("æœ€æ–°",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);

	push("â€”â€”",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("â€”â€”",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("å¤§çƒ­",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

<js>
if(/netUrl/.test(baseUrl)){
  b = source.getKey();
  url1 = String(baseUrl).replace(/netUrl\//,'');
  page = String(java.ajax(url1)).match(/\(ç¬¬1\/(\d+)é¡µ\)/)[1];
  url2 = String(url1).replace(/(\d+).html/,"$1_"+page+".html");
  url = b+java.ajax(url2).match(/<a href="([^"]+)">ä¸‹ä¸€èŠ‚<\/a>/)[1];
  java.put('url',url);
result=java.ajax(url);
}
result
</js>.RBGsectionThree-content p@textNodes

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[];
base = source.getKey();
lis=java.getElements('section .BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a');
for(i in lis){
	url=lis[i].attr('href');
	/javascript/.test(url)?url='/netUrl'+lis[i-1].attr('href'):url;
	url=base+url;
	list.push({"text":lis[i].text(),"href":url})
}
list
</js>

<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\nâ€¼ï¸è¯·å¡«å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„Urlâ€¼ï¸\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//æ¡Œé¢ç‰ˆUA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//æ‰‹æœºç‰ˆUA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //è¯·è‡ªè¡Œé€‰æ‹©UAï¼Œâ†“â†“â†“å¡«å…¥æ­¤å¤„
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.java.security,
    Packages.java.security.interfaces,
    Packages.java.security.spec,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function encrypt(str){
        var bArr = String(str).getBytes("UTF-8");
        var mac = Mac.getInstance("HmacSHA256");
        mac .init(SecretKeySpec(String("wj3imab73kwceuf51lf01ORHe2cmo8X0YrZwF4p2uv3WEfmqxrT2oIBwRFRNErXW20UKal15ZTDdxPKU43puZFqcuXkvrQmadhp1wn6YPEDO4WRgInp8NNNQo4uNsWF1CELOzx7yPOS4pQbhTRWB4qRm0a4ENIegN0SH7K2STbsyaCuWh7m7s3rTpb5dK3CcDdsT35vo0xNbPZI2dJmKoIeKk9p3YhBLNWp9WoZqn9Qihpvn4nvgJzVSacgy2MTo").getBytes("UTF-8"),"HmacSHA256"));
        return mac.doFinal(bArr)
    }
  function encode(bArr) {
        if (bArr === null) {
            return null;
        }
        var length = bArr.length * 8;
        if (length === 0) {
            return "";
        }
        var i10 = length % 24;
        var i11 = parseInt(length / 24);
        var cArr = new Array((i10 !== 0 ? i11 + 1 : i11) * 4);
        var i12 = 0;
        var i13 = 0;
        var i14 = 0;
        while (i12 < i11) {
                var i15 = i13 + 1;
                var b10 = bArr[i13];
                var i16 = i15 + 1;
                var b11 = bArr[i15];
                var i17 = i16 + 1;
                var b12 = bArr[i16];
                var b13 = (b11 & 15)&255;

searchUrl:
<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\nâ€¼ï¸è¯·å¡«å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„Urlâ€¼ï¸\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//æ¡Œé¢ç‰ˆUA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//æ‰‹æœºç‰ˆUA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //è¯·è‡ªè¡Œé€‰æ‹©UAï¼Œâ†“â†“â†“å¡«å…¥æ­¤å¤„
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>
